price: Na wͻ dwidwa (anaasε wͻ’bͻne) mmepͻ no mu deyε afie anaasε atenaeε wͻ abodweε mu.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
